result.markdown: --- title: "NSF Grant Recommended for Funding" description: | A short description of the post. author: - name: Rodney Dyer url: https://dyerlab.org affiliation: Center for Environmental Studies affiliation_url: https://ces.vcu.edu orcid_id: 0000-0003-4707-3453 date: 2015-11-18 output: distill::distill_article: self_contained: false --- The [Johnson](http://www.vcuderekjohnson.com/) and [Dyer](http://dyerlab.bio.vcu.edu) laboratories have been funded by DEB-Evolutionary Ecology for the project, _A landscape resistance mapping approach to understanding species invasion patterns_. Congratulations to the gypsy moth crew.
